title: Import Wizard V2 iterations
body:
Now that we have learned more on this a few general thoughts for next iteration

- Standard next/skip/previous format from new wizards
This will also help that the user should be able to keep clicking "next".
Maybe we can move some of the things into radial selection or similar, and then they can just click next
- Refactors, we added a lot of extra stuff updates etc after and many opportunities to improve that
![wizard steps if no prelabled data make less sense](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18080164/161379742-e39b5db0-0890-483f-9b71-68f18912e8c4.PNG)
- we should only show steps relevant to user selections, e.g. if the user is not updating files not showing match schema 
- bug, if select `cloud provider`, can't "go back" to `my computer`
- hotkeys? or something to bounce to next step
- linking to help videos

The import wizard is still a huge step forward in current state as is, but a lot of opportunities to further improve it.
